attributes.action: commemorate the great work of Tony Hart with a gallery space named after him at The National Gallery London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Hart encouraged the nation to draw, paint and sculpt. On the sad news of his having to give up his own artistic pursuits I encourage the creation of a Tony Hart Gallery (with the theme music playing if possible) at the National Gallery, to celebrate this British art hero, his enthusiasm for new talent and his love of art.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
